data.description: nice opaque identifier minter and binder
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I don't know if Noid should be a new namespace.

    This module exists (at the moment) mostly to support the primary
    interface, which is a "noid" script included with the hear module.
    As far as I can tell, the range and scope of the script plus module
    is fairly unique. On the other hand, I can see an argument for
    having the module namespace be Data::Noid.

    This is my first module upload and I'd be happy to get advice.
